      • cast

        public static <F,T> Function<F,T> cast(java.lang.Class<T> target)

        Identity function casting its arguments to a particular type.

        Parameters:
        F - The function’s input type.
        T - The type to which to cast arguments.
        target - The target type for arguments.
        Returns:
        A function which, when applied to an object, casts it to type target.
